AccountCallRefunded(address,address,addr.details: Emitted when the call is refunded

AccountOwnerAdded(address,address).details: Emitted when the new owner is added

AccountOwnerRemoved(address,address).details: Emitted when the existing owner is removed

executeAccountTransaction(address,addres.details: Deploys an account if not deployed yet

refundAccountCall(address,address,uint25.details: Deploys an account if not deployed yet

verifyAccountOwner(address,address).notice: Verifies the owner of the account at the current block

verifyAccountOwnerAtBlock(address,addres.notice: Verifies the owner of the account at a specific block

userdoc.notice: A registry for personal (controlled by owners) accounts
